readable.title: 3413669228_ec64efeb34
readable.content: A blonde girl is wearing a silver helmet , elbow and knee pads , and Rollerblades . A child sits on a curb with inline skates and protective gear . A child wearing Rollerblades and sitting on a curb . The blonde girl is wearing a silver helmet , knee pads , and Rollerblades . The girl takes a break from rollerblading .
